basics.name: Ulises Alejandro MORA QUINTANA
basics.label: Desarrollador Full Stack / Cloud Engineer
basics.summary: With over five years of experience in full stack development and cloud architecture, I have worked with technologies such as TypeScript, JavaScript, NestJS, React, Angular, ASP.NET, and Django. In recent years, I have specialized in clean architectures like DDD and SOLID principles, developing high-performance solutions in microservices and Lambda cloud environments. In my recent roles, I have led teams in designing and implementing scalable, microservice-oriented architectures, integrating advanced technologies like RabbitMQ for messaging, Redis for caching, and GraphQL for efficient data exchanges. I have experience with various cloud platforms, including AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud, as well as Terraform for infrastructure as code. On the frontend, I have worked on both web and mobile applications with React Native and Ionic, developing modern and optimized interfaces. I also have solid experience in DevOps, setting up CI/CD pipelines and container orchestration with Docker. I am motivated by leadership and collaborative work across different departments to create products that meet business objectives and provide value to the end user.

work.name: GPT4SALES
work.summary: Design and implement cloud-based solutions focused on a chatbot application using OpenAI. Provide architectural guidance and leadership to the development team using: ● LLM ● OPENAI API ● Langchain ● NestJS ● Microservices ● Redis ● GraphQL ● RabbitMQ ● MongoDB ● Postgres
highlights: Looking for a Lead Architect and cloud expert to design and implement cloud-based solutions, focusing on a chatbot application using OpenAI. This role will use technologies such as NestJS, microservices, Redis, GraphQL, and RabbitMQ. Key responsibilities: Design and Implement Microservices: Develop and maintain a system of 4 microservices using NestJS. Ensure the scalability, reliability, and performance of the microservices architecture. API Development: Create and manage APIs using GraphQL for efficient data exchange. Cache and Data Storage: Implement Redis for cache solutions to improve application performance. Messaging: Integrate RabbitMQ for efficient messaging and communication between services. Cloud Infrastructure: Design, deploy, and manage cloud infrastructure ensuring optimal performance and cost efficiency. Lead and Mentor: Provide architectural guidance and leadership to the development team.

work.name: Autocom (Mexico - remote)

work.summary: ● .net ● asp net core ● Migrate code from asp net core 2.2 to asp net 7 ● Containerize applications to migrate to microservices ● Use Nodejs and Postgres ● Move projects to AWS using Lambda, API Gateway, and ECS ● Experience with design patterns ● Improve application performance using cache and best practices

work.name: PartsBadger (USA - remote)
work.summary: ● Backend development in Django Rest using RabbitMQ and Celery for asynchronous tasks ● Build an initial project by containerizing frontend and backend ● Work with clean architecture such as DDD on the frontend ● Work on the web application frontend with React - Redux / RTK using the latest version of React with Vite for better performance ● Work with Three.js in React for 3D

work.name: OmniDoc (Mexico City)
work.summary: Build microservices with NestJS and Python ● Use of ORM (TypeORM in NestJS) with Postgres and GraphQL ● Work with clean architecture like DDD ● Use CQRS for Microservices ● Experience with design patterns ● Lead the web application frontend with React - Redux and RTK and Angular ● Build a Lambda function with Docker in AWS ● Testing with Cypress.

work.name: Bambú Mobile (Mexico - Remote)
work.summary: ● Build APIs with NestJs, Express, ASP NET Core, Django, and Spring ● Experience with microservices for web and mobile applications ● Work with Firebase (Hosting, Firestore, Cloud Messaging, etc.) ● Use ORM for Postgres, MariaDB, MongoDB, Microsoft SQL Server, and Redis ● Contribute to every project delivery phase in different roles ● Use IONIC and React Native to build Android and iOS applications ● Use architecture patterns for some system applications ● CI/CD implementation in AWS with TravisCI and Github Actions with Docker ● Use AWS, Google Cloud, Firebase, and Heroku ● Server setup (Linux and Microsoft Windows Server) for web applications ● Build unique web applications with Angular, React, Next.js, and Angular Universal with SSR ● (REST, SOAP, socket, and GraphQL) ● AWS with EC2, Route53, Elastic Beanstalk, S3 ● Load Balancer, RDS, etc.

work.name: Bblazar (Mexico City - personal project)
work.summary: ● Developed two Dapps applications with Solidity (ERC 20 and ERC721 smart contracts) running on Ethereum and the frontend developed in Web3 with Next.js. Also developed a mobile application on ANDROID for a Dapp. ● Developed an e-commerce site with Angular Universal and created an API with NestJS ● Experience working with React Three for 3D sites ● Experience working with Unity and Unreal to develop AR/VR experiences
